main event: A single triangular UFO was observed in Donora, Pennsylvania, for a duration of one hour and 35 minutes on August 19, 1956.
interesting points: The object was triangular when viewed through binoculars and appeared to be reddish brown,The size of the object was compared to the North Star,Movement patterns included a clockwise motion and disappearing then reappearing,It was visible for almost the entire duration of the sighting except for 15 minutes when obscured by clouds,The report concluded that the sighting was probably astronomical.
witness description: civilians, including a 38-year-old man, his wife, and a housewife with her son
